FOLLOW THE ACO TOUR Watch on YouTube Meet the Top 20 Players on the ACO Tour View all World Standings SINGLES WOMENS SENIORS JUNIORS Upcoming Cornhole Tournaments See all ACO Season XX World Tour Stops August 29, 30 & 31 BUFFALO, NEW YORK September 5 & 6 LAKE CHARLES, LOUISIANA September 12 & 13 TOLEDO, OHIO September 12 & 13 ATLANTIC CITY, NEW JERSEY September 12 & 13 LAKE TAHOE, NEVADA September 26 & 27 CHARLOTTETOWN, PEI, CANADA September 26 & 27 BRYAN, TEXAS October 3 & 4 HAMILTON, OHIO American Cornhole: The First and Official Governing Body for the Sport of Cornhole, since 2005. Cornhole Rules, World Standings, Tournaments, Cornhole Leagues, Cornhole Boards & Bags ABOUT AMERICAN CORNHOLE | MEDIA COVERAGE CORNHOLE RULES Whether you’re a backyard cornhole player or a tournament level pro, these are the cornhole rules that are officially followed worldwide for the sport. GET THE RULES WORLD STANDINGS ACO World Standings show the top ACO players in any Division at any time during the Season, based on their play across one or more ACO points-earning tournaments. VIEW STANDINGS Find Results of ACO Tournaments from this Season, and go back and look through the brackets and stats of every tournament and game played. VIEW RESULTS ACO EVENTS From local Regional Tournaments, to ACO Majors, to the World Championships of Cornhole in July… and fun cornhole parties and events in between… this is where to find your next time and place to get in on the action! FIND EVENTS PLAYER'S SITE If you’re an ACO Player, go to CornholePlayers.com to find everything you need to play. PLAYERS SITE NEW MEMBERS New to cornhole, or new to the ACO? Start here. NEW MEMBERS AREA YOUR ROAD TO WORLD CHAMPION STARTS HERE: American Cornhole Membership Your membership to American Cornhole unlocks exclusive access to clubs, events, tournaments, and connects you to a worldwide cornhole family. ACO is grateful for the support our members provide to the competitive sport of cornhole. BECOME A MEMBER BENEFITS OF MEMBERSHIP Experience the Feeling. If your heart’s in the game, then get involved as an American Cornhole Organization Certified Official! How it Works! Guess the Maze Design for this Year! Here are your Clues! 1. Cowboy Boots 2. Cow Girl 3. Horseshoes 4. Bell Bottoms All correct guesses will receive 1 free ticket, and your name will be entered into a drawing for a Mega Gift Basket! Deadline is 8:00 am Monday 9/1! Conner’s A-Maize-Ing Acres 19856 Baldwin and Saint George Road, Hilliard, Florida 32046, United States (904) 879 5453 October / November Hours Mon Closed Tue By Appointment Wed By Appointment Thu By Appointment Fri 04:00 pm – 10:00 pm Sat 10:00 am – 10:00 am Sun Closed Connect With Us 2025 Events Field Trips The Maze About the Farm Join our Team Conner's A-Maize-Ing Acres 19856 County Road 121 Hilliard, Fl 32046 904-879-5453 / info@connerscornmaze.com Copyright © 2019 Conner's A-Maize-Ing Acres by JandA Group - All Rights Reserved. Under Florida law, an agritourism operator is not liable for injury or death of, or damage or loss to, a participant in an agritourism activity conducted at this agritourism location if such injury, death, damage, or loss results from the inherent risks of the agritourism activity. Inherent risks of agritourism activities include, among others, risks of injury inherent to land, equipment, and animals, as well as the potential for you to act in a negligent manner that may contribute to your injury, death, damage, or loss. You are assuming the risk of participating in this agritourism activity." FAQs - Common Questions - Conner's A-Maize-Ing Acres FALL FESTIVAL October 3rd - October 25th! 
2025 SEASON PASSES AVAILABLE NOW Home Ticket Info / Activities 2025 Events Field Trips Parties & Events The Maze About the Farm MORE FAQs FOOD TRUCK COURT 2024 More Home Ticket Info / Activities 2025 Events Field Trips Parties & Events The Maze About the Farm MORE FAQs FOOD TRUCK COURT 2024 Home Ticket Info / Activities 2025 Events Field Trips Parties & Events The Maze About the Farm MORE FAQs FOOD TRUCK COURT 2024 Frequently Asked Questions ARE PETS ALLOWED? WHAT IS YOUR CANCELLATION POLICY? WHAT SHOULD I WEAR / BRING? Yes, dogs….Must email proof of up to date vaccines with attached documents, on a leash at all times, friendly, and cleaned up after. WHAT SHOULD I WEAR / BRING? WHAT IS YOUR CANCELLATION POLICY? WHAT SHOULD I WEAR / BRING? We suggest you wear comfortable clothing, & closed toed shoes. Bring sunscreen, bug spray, hand sanitizer / wipes and an umbrella or rain coat on rainy days. WHAT IS YOUR CANCELLATION POLICY? WHAT IS YOUR CANCELLATION POLICY? WHAT IS YOUR CANCELLATION POLICY? We have a 500ft long barn for shelter in the event of passing rain showers. However we will close in the event of inclement weather (thunder storms, lightening, or damaging winds.), for that reason guest will be given a rain check. CAN WE BRING OUTSIDE FOOD? CAN I SMOKE OR BRING ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES? WHAT IS YOUR CANCELLATION POLICY? Yes, although we serve food here, you are more than welcome to bring your own food and a blanket to spread out on the grass to eat, or eat at one of our picnic tables. DO I HAVE TO WEAR A MASK? CAN I SMOKE OR BRING ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES? CAN I SMOKE OR BRING ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES? As of now it is not required, but things change rapidly….Please keep checking our website for updated information. CAN I SMOKE OR BRING ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES? CAN I SMOKE OR BRING ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES? CAN I SMOKE OR BRING ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES? NO, we are a smoke free and alcohol free venue. ARE DRONES ALLOWED? WHAT ARE YOUR POLICIES FOR PROFESSIONAL PHOTOGRAPHY PHOTO SHOOTS? WHAT ARE YOUR POLICIES FOR PROFESSIONAL PHOTOGRAPHY PHOTO SHOOTS? No, for the safety and privacy of our visitors we do not allow drones. WHAT ARE YOUR POLICIES FOR PROFESSIONAL PHOTOGRAPHY PHOTO SHOOTS? WHAT ARE YOUR POLICIES FOR PROFESSIONAL PHOTOGRAPHY PHOTO SHOOTS? WHAT ARE YOUR POLICIES FOR PROFESSIONAL PHOTOGRAPHY PHOTO SHOOTS? Photographers and clients must pay regular admission at the ticket booth when we are open to the general public. We also allow photo shoots when we are closed to the general public. Please e-mail info@connerscornmaze.com for photo shoot information DO YOU HAVE A HAUNTED MAZE? DO YOU HAVE NON HAUNTED NIGHTS? DO YOU HAVE NON HAUNTED NIGHTS? ABSOLUTELY….. by reservation only Oct. 24th & 25th DO YOU HAVE NON HAUNTED NIGHTS? DO YOU HAVE NON HAUNTED NIGHTS? DO YOU HAVE NON HAUNTED NIGHTS? ABSOLUTELY ….. October 17th & 18th Photography If you would like to have your photo taken at our farm by a professional photographer, please have them contact us. If you do not already have one, here is a list of a few we know available to contact. Amanda at https://www.facebook.com/amandarobinsonphotography24 Dana at https://bellabluephoto.com/ Mary at https://jamesmiller1980.wixsite.com/memoriesphotography Sarah at https://bespokesouthernphotography.com/ Susan at https://www.facebook.com/susaneasonphotography/ Whitney at https://whitneybarlowphoto.mypixieset.com/ If scheduled during our regular business hours...everyone pays general admission. If scheduled during our non business hours....the venue fee is $100 per hour General Public Hours  - Fridays  4pm to 8pm and Saturdays 10am to 8pm See Ticket page or Fall Events page for special hours. .
